name: Iridescent (Norb)
description:
Iridescent is a puzzle-based cooperative multiplayer game for two players.

The goal of the game is to complete levels in which players will collect different colors. These colors will be able to be mixed and thus players can create additional colors that will be needed to overcome various obstacles.

Authors:

  • Norbert Vígh - Programming, Game Design, 3D models, Animations, 2D graphics
  • Thomas Višvader - Programming, Game Design, Level Design
  • Ákos Kappel - Programming and Game Design
  • Students from the Academy of Performing Arts in Bratislava - 3D models
